name: cad11
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: sylibr(wa(w0, w1), wcad(w0, w1, w2), wo(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, wxo(w0, w1))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), wcad(w0, w1, w2))
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), wo(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, wxo(w0, w1))))
-| wb(wcad(w0, w1, w2), wo(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, wxo(w0, w1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), wcad(w0, w1, w2))
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), wo(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, wxo(w0, w1))))
-| wb(wcad(w0, w1, w2), wo(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, wxo(w0, w1))))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(w0, w1), wo(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, wxo(w0, w1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), wcad(w0, w1, w2))
-| wb(wcad(w0, w1, w2), wo(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, wxo(w0, w1))))

body.origin: |- wb(wcad(w0, w1, w2), wo(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, wxo(w0, w1))))

comment: If (at least) two inputs are true, then the adder carry is true. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Sep-2016.)
